channel.title: Third Dagger (Fanmade faction)
channel.description:
># [color=Orange]**Controller** [/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >**Third Dagger Manipulative** >**Third Dagger (passive) -** Speak to the Third Dagger at night. **Seethed (day ability) -** The next time you whisper it will be seen as though it was from another player - 3 uses. **Silver Arrow (night ability) -** Convert a player to the Third Dagger. 1 night cooldown - Infinite Uses. **Engulfed (night ability) -** Select a player. They will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities (4 uses) *Bend those to your will, and kill the rest.*
># [color=Orange]**Blacksmith** [/color] :shield: >**Third Dagger Killing** >**Third Dagger (passive) -** Speak to the Third Dagger at night. **Eyedrop (day ability) -** Poison a player. They will die in 2 nights unless healed (2 uses) **Hammer and anvil (night ability) -** Select a player. You will attack them tonight. *Bend those to your will, and kill the rest.*
># [color=Orange]**Blind Eye** [/color] :shield: >**Third Dagger Investigative** >**Third Dagger (passive) -** Speak to the Third Dagger at night. **Sixth Sense (passive) -** You are alerted if you are visited by an Investigative class. **Blind Sense (night ability) -** Learn a players classtype - Infinite uses. *Bend those to your will, and kill the rest.*
># [color=Orange]**Guardian** [/color] :shield: >**Third Dagger Killer** >**Third Dagger (passive) -** Speak to the Third Dagger at night. **Time to Decide (day ability) -** Select a player. They will gain death immunity tonight (1 use) **Purge (night ability) -** Visit a player. You will kill anyone who visits them (1 use) **Crusade (night ability) -** Visit a player. You will kill one player who visits them, regardless of their faction. 1 night cooldown - Infinite Uses. *Bend those to your will, and kill the rest.*
**the conversion is a promotion system, but if the leader dies, he’s never being replaced. Two players will spawn, one Blacksmith and leader. The starting blacksmith can take over.** *MORE COMING.*

item.title: Third Dagger (Fanmade faction)
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
Why would they bring a dagger they stabbed back in servitude?
Actually if it’s a second third dagger it’s probably the 2/3 Dagger.

Read full topic

item.title: Third Dagger (Fanmade faction)

item.description:

item.title: Third Dagger (Fanmade faction)

item.description:
